title: A Guy Winked At Amy…Was He Hitting on Her? + Lunchbox Got Random Strangers To Impersonate Country Artists + Mailbag: Can You Use a Gift card on YOUR HALF ONLY When Splitting the Bill?
itunes:title: A Guy Winked At Amy…Was He Hitting on Her? + Lunchbox Got Random Strangers To Impersonate Country Artists + Mailbag: Can You Use a Gift card on YOUR HALF ONLY When Splitting the Bill?
description:
Amy says a guy winked at her when she was picking up food. She wants to know if we think she was hitting on her. Lunchbox went out on the street and asked strangers if they would pretend to pose as famous country artists to sing Happy Birthday to his fictional son. In the mailbag, our listener was out to dinner with her partner & another couple. When they split the bill per couple, the couple they were with used a gift card to pay for their bill. Our listener thought they should use the gift card for the whole bill.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
